CONTRACT_ID: Procurement, delivery and installation of laboratory equipment to Ottawa on or by March 31st, 2023
short_summary: Procurement, delivery, installation of Lab equipments
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title

Procurement, delivery, and installation of laboratory equipment to Ottawa.

## Reference Number

PW-23-01021354

## Solicitation Number

1000248033

## Publication Date

January 13, 2023

## Tender Closing Date

February 21, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

## Status

Expired

## Description

Health Canada is seeking a supplier for the procurement, delivery, and installation of laboratory equipment to Ottawa by March 31st, 2023. The requirement falls under the Product Category “Laboratory Equipment” and is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). There are no security requirements associated with this procurement.

## Contact Information

* Christian Belanger
* Email: christian.belanger@canada.ca
* Phone: 613-697-0681

## Related Documents

None

## Tender Details

* Procurement Method: Competitive – Limited Tendering
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Additional Information

This procurement is being conducted under the Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) Supply Arrangement #E60PV-19EQUI. Suppliers must be registered with the Government of Canada’s Supplier Registration System to participate in this tender. For more information, please consult the bid solicitation document.
